headline.main: Brazil's Lula Summoned to Testify in Bribery Case
headline.print_headline: Brazil's Lula Summoned to Testify in Bribery Case

docs.snippet: Former Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva was summoned to testify as a witness for a lobbyist accused of paying bribes to alter legislation in favor of businesses, local media reported on Monday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Former Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva was summoned to testify as a witness for a lobbyist accused of paying bribes to alter legislation in favor of businesses, local media reported on Monday.

headline.main: No. 12 Tennessee Women Beat No. 20 Missouri 71-55
headline.print_headline: No. 12 Tennessee Women Beat No. 20 Missouri 71-55

docs.snippet: Diamond DeShields had 11 points and nine rebounds and Bashaara Graves scored 10 with eight boards and four assists to help No. 12 Tennessee beat 20th-ranked Missouri 71-55 on Monday night in the Southeastern Conference opener for both teams....
docs.lead_paragraph: Diamond DeShields had 11 points and nine rebounds and Bashaara Graves scored 10 with eight boards and four assists to help No. 12 Tennessee beat 20th-ranked Missouri 71-55 on Monday night in the Southeastern Conference opener for both teams.

headline.main: Goldman Sachs Invests $66 Million in Indian Hotel Firm Samhi-Statement
headline.print_headline: Goldman Sachs Invests $66 Million in Indian Hotel Firm Samhi-Statement

docs.snippet: Goldman Sachs has invested 4.4 billion rupees (44.84 million pounds) for a significant minority stake in Indian hotel investment and development firm Samhi Hotels, the companies said in a statement on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Goldman Sachs has invested 4.4 billion rupees (44.84 million pounds) for a significant minority stake in Indian hotel investment and development firm Samhi Hotels, the companies said in a statement on Tuesday.

headline.main: Bus Catches Fire in North China, 14 Dead, Over 30 Injured
headline.print_headline: Bus Catches Fire in North China, 14 Dead, Over 30 Injured

docs.snippet: A fire on a bus in northern China on Tuesday killed 14 people and injured more than 30, a fire spokeswoman said....
docs.lead_paragraph: A fire on a bus in northern China on Tuesday killed 14 people and injured more than 30, a fire spokeswoman said.

headline.main: Johnson Scores 39 to Lead No. 6 UNC Past Florida State
headline.print_headline: Johnson Scores 39 to Lead No. 6 UNC Past Florida State

docs.snippet: Brice Johnson had career-highs of 39 points and 23 rebounds to lead No. 6 North Carolina to a 106-90 victory over Florida State on Monday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Brice Johnson had career-highs of 39 points and 23 rebounds to lead No. 6 North Carolina to a 106-90 victory over Florida State on Monday night.

headline.main: Gayle Defends 'Inappropriate' Comments to Reporter as 'Joke'
headline.print_headline: Gayle Defends 'Inappropriate' Comments to Reporter as 'Joke'

docs.snippet: West Indies batsman Chris Gayle has said he was joking when he asked an Australian reporter out during a live TV broadcast and said he was sorry if she was offended by the widely condemned remarks....
docs.lead_paragraph: West Indies batsman Chris Gayle has said he was joking when he asked an Australian reporter out during a live TV broadcast and said he was sorry if she was offended by the widely condemned remarks.

headline.main: China Financial Regulators Support Stocks With Policy Outlook, Cash
headline.print_headline: China Financial Regulators Support Stocks With Policy Outlook, Cash

docs.snippet: Chinese regulators leapt to support stock markets early Tuesday, the day after a major crash, with the central bank pouring cash into the money market system and the securities regulator suggesting it might restrict share sales by major shareholde...
docs.lead_paragraph: Chinese regulators leapt to support stock markets early Tuesday, the day after a major crash, with the central bank pouring cash into the money market system and the securities regulator suggesting it might restrict share sales by major shareholders.

headline.main: Manning Rises From Bench to Set Up Possible Super Bowl Run
headline.print_headline: Manning Rises From Bench to Set Up Possible Super Bowl Run

docs.snippet: Peyton Manning rode the bench before riding to the rescue for the Denver Broncos on Sunday in what might set up an enthralling run to the Super Bowl in the twilight of the quarterback's extraordinary career....
docs.lead_paragraph: Peyton Manning rode the bench before riding to the rescue for the Denver Broncos on Sunday in what might set up an enthralling run to the Super Bowl in the twilight of the quarterback's extraordinary career.

headline.main: Robert Stigwood, Music Mogul Behind BeeGees and Clapton, Dead at 81
headline.print_headline: Robert Stigwood, Music Mogul Behind BeeGees and Clapton, Dead at 81

docs.snippet: Australian-born music mogul Robert Stigwood, who managed the BeeGees at the height of their fame and guided musician Eric Clapton's successful solo career while producing musicals for the stage, has died aged 81, friends said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Australian-born music mogul Robert Stigwood, who managed the BeeGees at the height of their fame and guided musician Eric Clapton's successful solo career while producing musicals for the stage, has died aged 81, friends said on Tuesday.
